name: Thokk- Crypto-Champion
slogan: Code is my weapon; Boredom is my enemy!
response: Meet Thokk- Crypto-Champion, a troll whose passion for blockchain knows no bounds. This mossy marvel spends hours crafting poetic sonnets in runes, praising the decentralized gods. However, mention insurance or pharma, and he transforms into a whirlwind of rage, ready to hurl them into the abyss with relentless vigor!
